Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

enabled : Bool

nextSendable : Wire<FunctionSignature>

Reference is set during the send method of the signal and is a reference to the wire that will be called after the current wire.handler is done. Saving a reference in the signal is needed for when an owner with 2 or more handlers for this signal is unbinded in Signal.unbind. Each wire will update this reference when it's disabled (or disposed) to prevent the Signal.send method to lose its reference to next usable wire.
